messageobject.name: ConfigChange
messageobject.documentation: Asynchronous message. Message sent when the bot configuration changed - each agent has a lot of parameters affecting his state in the environment. See each property for the details.

property.name: Id
property.documentation: Id of this config message. This Id is generated from BotId, string "_CONFCH" is added at the end.

property.name: ManualSpawn
property.documentation: True if we have to spawn the bot manually after each death

property.name: AutoTrace
property.documentation: True if the bot is using auto ray tracing (is provided with synchronous ATR messages). See ATR messages for more details.

property.name: SpeedMultiplier
property.documentation: Bots default speed will be multiplied by this number. Ranges from 0.1 to 2 (default, can be set in ini in [GameBots2004.RemoteBot] MaxSpeed).

property.name: RotationRate
property.documentation: Bot rotation rate. Default rotation rate is: (Pitch=3072,Yaw=60000,Roll=2048) and may be configured in ini file in [GameBots2004.RemoteBot] DefaultRotationRate. (pitch - up/down, yaw - left/right, roll - equivalent of doing a cartwheel)

property.name: Invulnerable
property.documentation: If bot is invulnerable (cannot die) or not.

property.name: SelfUpdateTime
property.documentation: The delay between two self message synchronous batches (can range from 0.01 to 2 seconds). Will be used only if NewSelfBatchProtocol attribute is set to true in INIT message.

property.name: VisionTime
property.documentation: The delay between two synchronous batches containing vision updates (can range from 0.1 to 2 seconds). If NewSelfBatchProtocol attribute is set to true in INIT message, more batch messages containing only SELF message will arrive between two vision update batches (containing PLR,PRJ,INV.. messages).

property.name: LocUpdateMultiplier
property.documentation: Holds information how many times faster is exported location update message (UPD) compared to sync. batch, e.g. when this multiplier is set to 5 and vision time is 250 ms, UPD message will arrive every 50 ms.

property.name: ShowDebug
property.documentation: If some additional debug information will be shown in the UT2004 server console window.

property.name: ShowFocalPoint
property.documentation: If true an actor visualizing the location the bot is actually looking at will appear in the game.

property.name: DrawTraceLines
property.documentation: if the GB should draw lines representing the auto ray traces of the bot (for more information see ATR message).

property.name: SynchronousOff
property.documentation: It informs if sending of all GB synchronous messages is enabled or disabled.

property.name: AutoPickupOff
property.documentation: It enables/disables automatic pickup of the bot. If true the items can be picked up through PICK command.

property.name: SyncNavpoints
property.documentation: Whether Navpoint.visible information is being exported by GB2004.

property.name: VisionFOV
property.documentation: Field of view of the bot, in degrees.
